Name: Kalvin Bar-Dyness
Details:
Born ????, died 3015.

Kalvin Bar-Dyness was the previous lord of Tortuga City's Council of the Damned until he was killed by Lady Paula Trevalline. During his time as ruler of the Tortugan pirate gangs, Bar-Dyness was known to have a collection of LosTech items, including BattleMechs, which disappeared after his death. Despite many rumors and leads, no one has even confirmed the existence of the treasure, less found it.
